text: The new Market of Choice is mind-boggling. :white_check_mark: poke bar :white_check_mark: wine/beer/cider bar :white_check_mark: burrito/taco/nacho bar :white_check_mark: fruit/yogurt breakfast bar
Has anybody been to Marthaâ€™s in Rev Hall? looks like a good cafe/lunch spot with a good tap selection and a patio overlooking the dog park
hmm will check out on my walk home later

They offer nachos as part of the burrito/taco menu, and I think they're totally great. A manager checked in on me twice while I was waiting for the nachos, and explained that the first order was burned and the chef made the right call to re-make it so it would only be 1.5 minutes more. He seemed very apologetic about it, hehe, I almost felt awkward being like "hey, no problem at all".... I know they just opened yesterday and everyone is desperately scrambling, and I feel bad about them being so stressed out

attachments.title: Elements of Revolution Hall
attachments.text: The roof will be open tonight at 6pm for you to soak up the views. Refreshing drinks and food available in Marthas to take up! . . . #pdx #roofdeckview #marthaspdx #revolutionhall
